body: Improve cash flow, streamline cost allocation, and manage expenses, and process outgoing and incoming invoices faster by bundling UPS CampusShip®, Quantum View Manage®, and UPS Billing Center. You can even link these three software solutions to access with one ups.com ID, password and shipping account number. Because they're all designed by UPS, they work together to simplify cash flow management.
title: How can I simplify cash flow management
